name: CurrencyAPI.net
description: Real-time currency conversion on 152 currencies and cryptos

api_methods.name: Timeframe
api_methods.description: Display a currency conversion's historical rates within a given timeframe

parameters.name: end_date
parameters.description: Display the start date you wish to get the historical data from. Eg 2010-12-29

parameters.name: base
parameters.description: The currency code you want to get the historical data of. Eg, USD

parameters.name: start_date
parameters.description: Display the start date you wish to get the historical data from. Eg 2010-12-25

parameters.name: output
parameters.description: The output of the response. Either JSON or XML
